arts.ttl: Jack Butland confirms heartwarming Rangers absence reason as Liam Kelly gets props from hospital
arts.sum: Butland had to withdraw from Philippe Clement's starting XI and now everyone knows why

arts.ttl: Mansfield pick up first win in eight league matches by beating Rotherham
Reece James returns to training after more than a month out due to latest hamstring setback as Blues look to build their captains fitness back up
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL: James did not complete the full session as the club want to build him back up rather than rushing his rehab, but it is an important step in the 25-year-old's recovery.
